remarks: Strong state theorem.  The states on a Hilbert lattice define an ordering.  Remark in [Mayet] p. 370.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
str.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
str.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
stri $p |- ( A. f e. States ( ( f ` A ) = 1 -> ( f ` B ) = 1 ) -> A C_ B ) $.
$d A f $.
$d B f $.
